text: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps is a British sitcom. It is set in Runcorn, Cheshire. It ran from 26 February 2001 to 24 May 2011 on BBC Two. It stars Ralf Little, Natalie Casey, Will Mellor, Sheridan Smith, Kathryn Drysdale and Beverley Callard.
